#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#define mod 10000
using namespace std;
unsigned long ans[500001];
bool flag[500001]={0};
void pre()
{
	int i,j;
	for(i=1;i<=500000;i++)
	  ans[i]=1;	
	
	for(i=2;i<=250000;i++)
	{
		for(j=2*i;j<=500000;j+=i)
		{
			ans[j]=(ans[j]*i);
			if(ans[j]>9999)
				flag[j]=1;
			ans[j]=ans[j]%mod;
		}
	}
}
int main()
{   std:ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    pre();
    while(t--)
    {
    	cin>>n;
    	if(flag[n])
            printf("%04lu\n",ans[n]);
        else 
            printf("%lu\n",ans[n]);
    }
	return 0;
}
